chinese: K 刈，收割庄稼 n.千草堆
有了这台机器，我就可以轻松地修剪草坪了。
english: With this machine, I can easily mow the lawn

chinese: adj. 刺耳的
别刮黑板了,这刺耳的声音快把他们逼疯了。
english: Stop scratching the blackboard, The harsh noise is driving them crazy

chinese: vL， 确定数量
量杯帮我确定我需要的材料的用量。
english: A measuring cup helps me quantify the ingredients that I need

chinese: vi.茂盛
植物有充足的阳光就会茂盛。
几. 防御，防护
牧羊人建造的铁栅栏可以有效地防狠。
english: The iron fence built by the shepherd is a great defense against the wolf

chinese: D.阻力；抵抗；抵制；抵抗力
增加阻力跑步可能是一种训练跑步者的好方法。
english: Running with added resistance can be a good way to train runners

chinese: 几.猥琐下流；猥亵的话（或行为）
由于严重的交通堵塞，他坐在那儿大喊大叫地骂着下流的话。
english: He sat screaming obscenities because of the heavy traffic jam

chinese: n.灌溉
灌溉可以给草地补充水分。
english: Irrigation helps provide grassland with water

chinese: 吐.捕获，抓住；捕捉，留存 12.战利品
小男孩用网兜捉了只蝴蝶。
english: The boy captured a butterfly with his net

chinese: ad）.熟的，成熟的
你可以摘下这颗红色的草莓，因为它已经熟
english: You can pick the red strawberry because it's ripe

chinese: 几.复活，复兴
传染病消失后，这个旅游胜地又恢复了兴旺景
english: The tourist hotspot enjoyed a dramatic revival once the epidemic had faded away

chinese: n. 民兵组织
民兵们为了国家而战。
english: The militia fought for their country

chinese: adi. 微不足道的，可忽略不计的
小兔子似乎对拔河比赛只有微不足道的影响。
english: It seems as though the rabbit has a negligible impact on the tug of war

chinese: v.找出…⋯的位置
你可以用这个地图软件来定位最近的银行。
english: You can use the map application on your phone to locate the nearest bank

chinese: ad.假设的，假定的
这位物理学家提出了外星文明存在的假说。
english: The physicist proposed a hypothetical theory that an alien civilization does exist

chinese: adj，不透明的；难懂的
这扇窗是用不透明的玻璃做的。
english: The window is made of opaque glass
